DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-centre, double blind, randomised, placebo controlled, parallel group, phase 4 pilot study investigating colecalciferol (vitamin D3) as an add-on treatment to subcutaneously administered interferon-beta-1b in relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Colecalciferol as an Add-on Treatment to Interferon-beta-1b for Treatment of Multiple Sclerosis (MS)
